message: Valerie is right. It's a proper noun. You don't have to embrace that faith's deity in order to capitalize it when it is used as a proper noun. The rest of your drivel is just .. weird. It's clear you need to bash religion. It's also kinda fun to bash religion. But read this piece; it refers to a reference made by a journalist to a particular oath that includes the phrase """"So help me God."""" The journalist, out of spite, did not capitalize """"God,"""" and he was wrong to do that.
